column1: '''Beau-Jolly''' was a European company founded in [[1984]].<ref name="CPC">[http://www.cpcwiki.eu/index.php/Beau_Jolly Beau-Jolly] at the CPCWiki (retrieved 30 December 2010)</ref> They re-distrubated [[the Tolkien Trilogy]] in Europe.<ref name="CPC"/><ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/trilogy.html The Tolkien Trilogy] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 30 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseek.cgi The Tolkien Trilogy] at [[wikipedia:World of Spectrum
